title: Designing Collaborative Science Learning Scenarios Based on Educational Modeling Language

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental science concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Team-based science learning scenario development using collaborative design tools in VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can design science learning scenarios using IMS LD-based visual editing tools.
Learners can verify the logical structure of scenarios through real-time interactions with team members via collaboration tools.
Learners can implement designed scenarios in VR simulation environments and present them as project deliverables.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
